roleset.name: able to be noticed

example.name: arg1
example.text: I have very hairy arms for a girl , not thick hairs like a male s but lots of very noticable , dark and long -LRB- I bleach regularly but it only lasts a day or two before the roots are noticable -RRB-

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT-4,5, notice.01.
